oracleEvent

public void oracleEvent(psl.groupspace.GroupspaceEvent ge)
Receives an event from Metaparser and WGC. If an event occures from Metaparser, it will call getFragment method and get proper schema definition. It may throw UnknownTag, InvalidQueryFragment and InvalidSchemaFragment exceptions.
Specified by:
oracleEvent in interface psl.oracle.roles.OracleRole
